title: Conviction
description: ** You must read Consolation first **   I fell in love with Liam only to be left shattered into a million pieces. Again. The idea of being without him cripples me but the reality is, he’s gone.  He doesn’t understand and I can’t make him.  If only he’d see the conviction behind my words—then he’d still be here.
author: Corinne Michaels
